name: Not So Grimm
description:
Venture deeper in the woods as a lost child, this forest seems to go on forever, why not try and find its denizens while you are there!

The post-jam version does not contain any new features, it only fixes a small audio issue and makes the little spirits easier to find.

Controls:

- ZQSD   move

- Mouse  look

- Esc    quit

Code & Art - Rongefilet

Music - NoNameNoSocks

Voices - Chauselle, Thiborc
